### Priority 1: Optimize Predictive Alerts System - Reduce false positives and improve responsiveness by implementing adaptive thresholds based on historical data trends rather than fixed values. This could lead to fewer unnecessary alerts and better resource allocation, ultimately enhancing system performance.

### Priority 2: Implement Cost-Effective Resource Scaling - Introduce auto-scaling features that dynamically adjust resource allocation (CPU/RAM) based on real-time usage patterns. This could help in significantly lowering operational costs by ensuring resources are only used when necessary and preventing over-provisioning.

### Priority 3: Enhance User Interface for Dashboard - Redesign the dashboard UI to include customizable views and personalized notifications based on user roles and preferences. This enhancement would improve user experience by allowing users to focus on the most relevant metrics, leading to increased efficiency and satisfaction in using the platform.
